group_1.narration: "The Union, Tokime Clan, and Promised Blood@have failed to unify as one,@and the eight Stones haven't been assembled."

group_1.textRight: So like, if you don't wanna fight,@why not just join the Neo-Magius already?
For real though, wouldn't that be a@way better chance to all join up?
How about it, Irorin?★

group_1.textLeft: It took me a long time to be able@to join up with others like this.
And I know it wasn't easy for everyone@here to agree to my plan...
So I can't just tell you "Oh, sure thing!"@with nothing else to go on...
Tell us what you're thinking, and explain@the whole Magical Girl Supremacy thing.

group_1.textRight: Sure, whatevs.

group_1.narration: "What this cutie and her bae have in mind is a society@where Magical Girls rule over humans."

"To get right into it, there's a@simple hierarchy of superiority.@Us cuties in the Neo-Magius top brass are at the top,@then the Neo-Magius rank and file,@then other Magical Girls,@and then humans at the bottom."
"The Magical Girls are all equal among themselves,@and the humans are all equal among themselves,@no difference in status. We won't be@demanding money or Grief Seeds or anything from anyone."
"So what's the difference between@regular Magical Girls and humans?@That totes-unbridgable inferiority thing, obviously.@Which is why the humans have to obey@anything Magical Girls say."
"I mean, come on, we all know how easily@humans can turn evil, right?@So the Magical Girls have to run things,@and 'guide' any humans that violate the equality."
"And duhh, but bad-mouthing@Magical Girls will be a no-no,@and all kinds of protest will be totes illegal.@Basically, the humans'll be just fine@if they exalt Magical Girls."
"Super simple, don't you think? Kyaha★"

"Oh, and speaking of Magical Girls,@the plan is for each area to have a leader appointed,@with access to the Auto-Purification System. @The higher they rank, the more priority they have in using it.@Aaaand, anyone with attitude problems@won't get to use it at all."
"The point is,@as long as you stay in your lane it'll all be okay,@and everyone can live in peace and equality.@Super simple, don't you think?"
"T-L-D-R, we Neo-Magius won't allow anyone,@human or Magical Girl, to be demeaned, belittled,@violated, or hurt."
"And don't worry, we'll abide by the rules we set!@That's what this group is all about!"

group_1.textLeft: Just as Sunao said, that'll be hell for people,@can't you see?
There's a clear division between@normal people and Magical Girls,
and they're forced to endure whatever@Magical girls tell them to do.

group_1.textRight: We're talking about Magical Girl Supremacy,@so of course it's like that.
For real girl, I dunno why you're even questioning it.

group_1.textLeft: So you admit that it's hell...

group_1.textRight: Being real with you, I believe that, from here on out,
people are gonna have no choice but to admit@how much better Magical Girls are.

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean...?

group_1.textRight: You should be able to guess after listening@to Kanagi Izumi and Mitama Yakumo.

group_1.textLeft: In order to prove the superiority@of Magical Girls over humans,
you're going to destroy them?!

group_1.textRight: That'll all come down to how they react when@we take them to the bargaining table.
As for the rest, Irorin, I'll just@leave it to your imagination!

group_1.narration: ―Iroha―@Kanagi!
―Kanagi―@I have no desire for destruction.
―Kanagi―@I merely hope to see how the populace can change@after being driven into a corner.
―Iroha―@...Why did you help us fight off the [textYellow:Kimochi] when@you knew you'd become our enemies now...?
―Kanagi―@I thought we should try to claim at least one [textYellow:Kimochi] while we@had the chance, and that fighting together would be quicker.

group_1.textLeft: I can't believe this, just what is Kanagi thinking...?

group_1.textCenter: Even if they've got four of the [textYellow:Kimochi] Stones,
it won't help them since Ui's the@only one that can use them, right?

group_1.textRight: That's what they were saying, but,@it might not be as sure as that...
Like, Mitama might be able to tweak them so@someone else can use them, or something...

group_1.textLeft: Shizuka has become wicked as well...
To think that she would taint the purity@that Asahi was so drawn to...

group_1.textRight: I don't think the chief even realizes it.@We'll have to knock some sense into her.
At this rate, she'll become a tyrant...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, she'll become an evil@that's disguised as good...

group_1.textRight: She invited me to join too, but I@didn't realize she was this serious.

group_1.textLeft: I think that Ao...
...even though she was acting confident, she felt@like she might be at the end of her rope to me.

group_1.textRight: She's weak, always has been, always will be.@Girls like her always bark the loudest.
And they always try to take control...@Just like Juri the Great herself.

group_1.textLeft: The time for us to save her arrived@sooner than we ever expected...

group_1.textRight: Sure did...

group_1.textLeft: What worries me is that we don't know@what the Neo-Magius will do next.

group_1.textRight: It sounds like they're trying to@take control from the other side.
...Maybe their next move won't be@about [textYellow:Kimochi] Stones at all.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, that's right...
If they're going to achieve Magical Girl Supremacy,@they'll have to inform people...
They'll have to tell everyone about@the superiority of Magical Girls...

group_1.textRight: Wha, does that mean it'll be just like@the old Wings of the Magius?!
They'll start going after normal people?!

group_1.textLeft: That really brings back some memories.
You may be right, Felicia...

group_1.textRight: Yeah... The citizens of Kamihama City@might be in danger once again...

group_1.narration: ―Iroha―@...Let's bring back Mitama and everyone else together.
―Mikage―@～～～～!!
